ISSUE.TITLE: Please update vulnerable commons libraries included as dependecies
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi, could you please update the version of apache commons libraries included in your war files? It contains several known serialization vulnerability including the one described below. https://commons.apache.org/proper/commons-collections/security-reports.html Please send me an email to jiri.stary on email domain gemalto.com for further details. Best Regards Jiri

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Async history: allow for post processing the create history job entities
